article: Dear Joan, How are you? It's very nice of you to write  _  me. From your letter I  _  a lot about you and your school. Now  _  me tell you something about me and my school. I am thirteen years old, I am in Class Two, Grade One at Changjiang Middle School. My father is a  _  . He teaches  _  English. My mother is a doctor. I  get up  early every morning and then  _  English at home. Our school is very big. It has 3,000 students and 250 teachers.  _  the teachers and the students work hard. After school, I like playing  _  volleyball with my classmates. Please come and have a look  _  our school if you are free. Please write to me soon. Millie
